name: Shape Shifter (itch) (FlaksOnItch.io)
description:
Shapeshifter: The Game!

Move around the void and try to shoot the enemies, think smart, think fast because they will move fast and come into action.

The music in this game was (partly) not  made by me, these are the wonderful people that made it:

Hooley Gun: https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/573278

Main Menu: https://www.mediafire.com/file/v520e3s35umhukm/Main-Meny.wav/file  (By me free-to-use)

Controls: https://www.mediafire.com/file/dg4v6n7wffjrswl/Controls.wav/file (also me free-to-use) 

I Hope You Have Fun Playing this game. This game will receive Updates as I am very happy with it and I think many people will like it too.
